1111001100001001 0001000100001100 1 -> sum: 0000010000010110, cout: 1
1010000101011110 1010011011001001 1 -> sum: 0100100000101000, cout: 1

0111010001111100 0110010001000010 0 -> sum: 1101100010111110, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
